Title: Batman & Robin
Overview: Batman and Robin deal with relationship issues while preventing Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from attacking Gotham City.
Tagline: Strength Now. Courage Always. Family, Above All. Batman and Robin!
Keywords: double life, dc comics, dual identity, crime fighter, fictional place, gotham city, superhero, credit card, super powers
Cast: George Clooney, Chris O'Donnell, Arnold Schwarzenegger
